title: Vladyslav Hromenko
text:
Vladyslav Anatoliyovych Hromenko (; born 16 December 2002) is a Ukrainian <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="midfielder">midfielder</a> who plays for <a href="FC%20Hirnyk-Sport%20Horishni%20Plavni">Hirnyk-Sport Horishni Plavni</a>.
Career.
Born in <a href="Pyriatyn">Pyriatyn</a>, Hromenko is a product of the local youth sportive school and <a href="FC%20Vorskla%20Poltava">Vorskla Poltava</a> system. 
Hromenko was a member of <a href="Ukrainian%20Premier%20League">Ukrainian Premier League</a> clubs Vorskla and <a href="FC%20Olimpik%20Donetsk">Olimpik Donetsk</a>, but he not made his debut for Vorskla or Olimpik in the <a href="Ukrainian%20Premier%20League">Ukrainian Premier League</a>, but only played in the <a href="Ukrainian%20Premier%20League%20Reserves%20and%20Under%2019">Ukrainian Premier League Reserves</a>.
